text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm today i'm going to show you my
grilled lemon yogurt chicken almost
nonfat except for the chicken alright so
here we go i got one whole chicken cut

thigh in the drumstick so what we're
going to do is we're going to get about

perfect for that
alright i'm going to put that in on my

all right some black pepper some salt
big pinch the juice of half a lemon and
then most importantly I got half a

plain nonfat Greek yogurt
now make sure it's plain yogurt you
don't to be thrown any you know fruity

around in this marinade now very
important here you mix this really well
with the tongs make sure all the garlic
and spices is distributed throughout the

we're going to put in the fridge and the
yogurt mixes with those herbs and spices
and lemon and garlic and just is the
most incredible marinade it tenderizes
the chicken a little bit but it really
gives it a great tangy delicious flavor
so it's perfect for grilling alright so
once that's marinated for a good three
or four hours you can go longer you can
go overnight if you want we're going to

with the vents open
I think this prevents the flare-ups and

off flavor so dark grill marks are good
really really dark grilled chickens good
but the flame ups cause it off flavor
okay now look at those sexy marks so

other half
that container of nonfat Greek plain
